page.title: 15Emergency Services,Whitby 1.
page.content: Forty people are employed at Whitby{ {Police Station.}There are 33 policemen.Each works an 8 hour shift. There is always a policeman on call. 7 policemen are in the station at any one time.If a 999 call comes in, a policeman is called on his radio and is asked to investigate. There are 4 police cars. The station can accommodate 5 prisoners. 15 full-time{firemen}work at the fire station with 13 part-timers on call. Their area covers Whitby Town, Staithes, Sneaton, Scaling Dam and Goathland.In an emergency 3 fire engines speed to the fire within 30 seconds.At home firemen have "bleepers" to call them out to duty and arrive at the station within 3 minutes of the call. On average the station responds to about 200 fires each year.
